Text: Couldn't get it to unrar, said the filename was too big

I got the same error, said something about 260 words...

I looked it up and I found out is a configuration from winrar. You just have to shorten the winrar file names or extract it on your C: drive. (Root).

Bottom line, the directory the pc as to access cannot have more than 260 words.
Works great on 3.55 Kmeaw. Thanks for the upload!
open it with winrar and then extract the folder inside to someplace like your desktop... instead of extracting it using right click... that way you skip the 260 word limit in the filename
Please how do you jailbreak 3.55 and run games that you download?

bood wiper. you need a ps3 with firmware 3.55 or lower! if you have 3.56 and up, forget it and get another ps3! i have a ps3 with firmware 3.41 and it works great! to mod your ps3, it's very easy!! you can find all the info you need here on the internernet. use your search engine. good luck

Black screen after selecting game and i did everything that said in manual

@gers03 You are supposed to copy/paste the files from the fix, not the folders, and keep the same file paths for each. If you copy/paste entire folders it deletes any original files not in the new folder, as you found out. This works fine with kmeaw/3.55 if done the right way. Not complaining, but wondering why the fix isn't applied before making a torrent of it to make it noob proof.

for those who have problems with winrar, use 7z to extract the archives, works flawlessly
but i got the black screen when i select a game (used the patch provided, copied the files folders by folders) still, doesn't work, black screen, will try a copy on internal HDD
select+x in multiman is all thats needed if you get a black screen during game selection menu.
